Class ControllerTournament

java.lang.Object
model.ControllerTournament
public class ControllerTournament extends Object
ControllerTournament handles the main functionality for managing teams, players, and referees within a tournament.

      public ControllerTournament()

  • Method Details

    • registerTeam

      public Team[] registerTeam(String nameTeam, String countryTeam, String directorTeam, int i)
      Registers a new team in the tournament.
      Parameters:
      nameTeam - Name of the team.
      countryTeam - Country of the team.
      directorTeam - Name of the head coach of the team.
      i - Position in the tournament's teams teamsTournament where the team will be registered.

    • getTeamsTournament

      public Team[] getTeamsTournament()

    • registerPlayer

      public List<Player> registerPlayer(String countryPlayer, String namePlayer, String numberDorsal, int option)
      Registers a new player for a team based on the specified position.
      Parameters:
      countryPlayer - The player's country.
      namePlayer - The player's name.
      numberDorsal - The player's jersey number.
      option - Indicates the position type: [1] Goalkeeper, [2] Defender, [3] Midfielder, [4] Forward.
      players - List of players where the newly registered player will be added.
      Returns:
      Updated list of players with the newly added player.

    • registerReferee

      public List<Referee> registerReferee(String idReferee, String nameReferee, String countryReferee, int option)
      Registers a new referee in the tournament.
      Parameters:
      idReferee - Referee's ID.
      nameReferee - Referee's name.
      countryReferee - Referee's country.
      option - Indicates the type of referee: [1] Central, [2] Assistant.
      Returns:
      Updated list of referees with the newly added referee.

    • showTeams

      public String showTeams()
      Generates a detailed summary of tournament teams and their players.
      Returns:
      a formatted String summarizing the tournament's teams and players. - Returns a message indicating "no teams registered" if `teamsTournament` is null. - Includes details about each team and its players, or a message if no players are available.

    • showPlayers

      public String showPlayers()

    • showReferees

      public String showReferees()
      Generates a summary of all referees registered for the tournament.
      Returns:
      a formatted String summarizing the referees in the tournament. - Returns a message indicating "no referees registered" if the list is empty. - Includes the name, ID, country, and type of each referee if available.

    • generateFixture

      public Match[] generateFixture()
      Generates the fixture for the tournament by shuffling teams and creating matches.
      Parameters:
      teamsTournament - Array of Team objects representing the tournament teams.
      Returns:
      Array of Match objects representing the scheduled matches.

    • showMatches

      public String showMatches()
      Generates a summary of all scheduled matches in the tournament.
      Parameters:
      matches - an array of Match objects representing the scheduled matches. Must not be null but may contain null elements.
      Returns:
      a formatted String listing all the matches with their details. - Each match includes the teams playing, and the match date. - Returns an empty String if the array contains no non-null matches.

    • avaibleCentralReferees

      public List<Referee> avaibleCentralReferees(Team validationTeam1, Team validationTeam2)
      Retrieves a list of available central referees who can officiate a match between two teams.
      Parameters:
      validationTeam1 - the first team in the match. Must not be null.
      validationTeam2 - the second team in the match. Must not be null.
      Returns:
      a list of Referee objects representing the available central referees. - The referees returned are of type "Central" and do not share the same nationality as either team. - Returns an empty list if no central referees meet the criteria.

    • avaibleAssistantReferees

      public List<Referee> avaibleAssistantReferees(Team validationTeam1, Team validationTeam2)
      Retrieves a list of available assistant referees who can officiate a match between two teams.
      Parameters:
      validationTeam1 - the first team in the match. Must not be null and should have a valid country.
      validationTeam2 - the second team in the match. Must not be null and should have a valid country.
      Returns:
      a list of Referee objects representing the available assistant referees. - The referees returned are of type "Assistant" and do not share the same nationality as either team. - Returns an empty list if no assistant referees meet the criteria.

    • modifyScorerMatch

      public String modifyScorerMatch(int option, int resultFirstTeam, int resultSecondTeam)
      Updates the result of a specific match in the tournament.
      Parameters:
      option - an integer representing the match index to be updated. Must be a valid index within the matches array.
      result - a String representing the new result of the match. Must not be null or empty.
      Returns:
      a confirmation message indicating the match result has been updated.

    • addScorerAndAssits

      public List<Goal> addScorerAndAssits(Player player, int quantity, Goal.GoalRecord typePlayer)
      Add a scorer or assists player.
      Parameters:
      player - Player who score/assist
      quantity - Quantity of score/assist
      typePlayer - Define the type of goal, if is a scorer or a assit
      Returns:
      a List of Object Goal, that saved the scorers and assists of soccer tournament

    • addCardPlayer

      public String addCardPlayer(Player player, Card.TypeCard typeCard)
      Add a card to a player
      Parameters:
      player - The bad guy, player who received a card by a referee
      typeCard - Yellow or Red
      Returns:
      a message of confirmation about the admonition was done.

    • tablePosition

      public String[][] tablePosition(int option)
      Shows the table position
      Parameters:
      option - Option selected by user, this var is use, to define what group of position table wants to see User.
      Returns:
      a matrix like a String, that show: Name of Team, Matches won, matches tied, matches lost, goals a favor, goals againts, diference goals and points

    • searchMaxScorer

      public Goal searchMaxScorer()
      Shows max scorer of tournament
      Returns:
      Goal, that will show user the max scorer of tournament

    • cardToTeam

      public void cardToTeam(Team teamFound)
      Add a card for a team, if a player of the team recieve some
      Parameters:
      teamFound - assigns a counter for a team to can calculate the fair play team

    • goodTeam

      public Team goodTeam()
      This method show User the fair play team
      Returns:
      Team who is the good team, less faults in all tournament, It's the fair play team

    • calculateRatioWins

      public double calculateRatioWins(Team teamSearch)
      Calculate the ratio of wins for a team
      Parameters:
      teamSearch - Team that user are searching to calculate his win rate
      Returns:
      double that saved ratio wins of the team
